#summary Installation instructions
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

Installing NautilusSvn is the easiest using Ubuntu, simply download [http://code.google.com/p/nautilussvn/downloads/list the Debian package] and off you go. For other distributions you have to fetch the [http://code.google.com/p/nautilussvn/downloads/list tarball] and follow the instructions described at this [http://code.google.com/p/nautilussvn/wiki/v012_Installation installation page]. 

Make sure you remove everything related to do with a previous release to prevent any problems.
